entry.title: Whereabouts of the Heart
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,084Chapters: 24/28Kudos: 29

Summary: A Merlin parody of The Swan Princess (+ some Brave & Anastasia mixed in, too)As an act of goodwill following a successful peace treaty with Camelot, the leaders of the Dragonrider Clan offer High Dragonlord Balinor’s firstborn child to be the future betrothed of Uther Pendragon’s young son, the two-year-old Prince Arthur. Half a year later, when Lady Hunith gives birth to a baby boy, little Merlin is welcomed with open arms by both peoples.Now eleven and nine years old respectively, Arthur and Merlin are formally introduced for the first time, and it goes about as well as you’d expect (which is to say not at all). But no worries, they still have a decade to grow to like each other enough for the engagement to proceed without any problems. That’s a lot of time to fall in love... so it’s practically a done deal. Right?

entry.title: What We Hide in the Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ClairvoyantStories

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,257Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 36

Summary: “Sir Leon,” Emil said, brushing a lock of dirty blond hair out of his face and crossing his arms over his raised knees. “I was wondering if I might ask you a question.”Leon turned slightly so he was facing the young knight. “What is it?”Emil hesitated for a moment before speaking. “Why does King Arthur do the cooking? Surely one of us should be doing it instead? Or a servant could have been brought along to do that sort of work?”Despite Emil’s hushed voice, his words seemed to echo around their small camp.“Arthur doesn’t bring servants on quests,” Leon said in a careful whisper, eyeing the king from his place on the dirt floor. “Not anymore.”-No one talks about Merlin anymore. It hurts too much.

entry.title: The shell that Merlin calls his body
entry.summary:
Author: Theoneyoudreamofinthenight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,414Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 27

Summary: Merlin is not human. Not truly. And this body—this fragile, mortal vessel—is never enough to contain what he is.He has always had the ability to slip free, to unshackle himself from flesh and bone, if only for a moment.Arthur learns of it in the worst way imaginable. And with it, he learns the truth of Merlin’s magic.

entry.title: Leaving Camelot
entry.summary:
Author: MyAmisFics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,457Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 251

Summary: "Speak treason against my uncle again, and I swear you can join yours in exile forever!” Arthur's voice thundered across the throne room. All Merlin had done was address his suspicions of Agravaines betrayal and framing Gaius. He hadn’t even mentioned Morgana, or even Uthers death.“There will not be any reason for banishment, sire. I leave Camelot willingly.”Merlin didn’t bow. Nor did he look back as he walked out of the throneroom, leaving a heartbroken Arthur behind him. After the big wooden doors closed shut, he could hear shouts and disagreements.

entry.summary:
Author: PapySanzo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,700Chapters: 11/25Kudos: 427

Summary: In the icy streets of Camelot City, a homeless Merlin struggles to survive after escaping an abusive relationship. When a chance encounter brings him face-to-face with Arthur Pendragon, the real estate billionaire owning half of Albion, Merlin is thrown a lifeline in the form of a job. But Pendragon’s offer is for sex work: a position as his 24/7 live-in sub. More than reluctant, but desperate for shelter, Merlin agrees, and soon finds himself struggling as past traumas resurface…

entry.title: Wooden Dragons
entry.summary:
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,713Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 619

Summary: “You-” Ygraine said, stepping up to point a finger in Uther’s face. “You are a liar and a murderer. The fact someone as sweet and caring as Vivienne is destined to marry you is a tragedy in itself, but if you expect me to hand over my brother’s rightful claim to Camelot’s throne-”“My claim to Camelot’s throne,” Uther threw back, face growing more red as Arthur looked between his parents in utter bewilderment. Merlin didn’t blame him. He had envisioned Uther and Ygraine’s love story to be more… well, less based in war and battles.Ygraine’s eyes narrowed as she grabbed a goblet of wine and threw it in Uther’s face. A few of the guards shifted, but Uther only raised a hand to pause them, spitting out the wine with furious eyes.“You,” Ygraine said coldly. “Are unworthy to sit upon a stool, let alone a throne.”From a few feet away, Balinor scoffed as he sipped from his own goblet. “I kind of like having her as a hostage, Uther. She livens up the place.”OrIn a desperate attempt to save Arthur at Camlann, Merlin tries to reverse time. It works perhaps a tad too well.

entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,776Chapters: 13/27Kudos: 87

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Unaware of the world beyond the castle walls, Merlin’s life changes when the brave knight Arthur enters the picture, showing him the depth of love and teaching him to find his own voice.Together, they must face the trials that come their way.

entry.title: The Camelot Saga
entry.summary:
Author: the_cursebreaker

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,903Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 28

Summary: Arthur has been on an odyssey, a long journey that seemed to have no end in sight, just trying to get home to his husband and son.Merlin has been waiting for his husband to return from war for twenty years, keeping the suitors at bay and trying to protect himself, his son, and their kingdom.It has finally all come to an end, but there's one last thing Arthur has to do before he can reclaim his throne and see his husband once more. He must deal with the suitors.-Based on The Ithaca Saga from EPIC: The Musical

entry.title: Ghost on the Wind
entry.summary:
Author: EbenHyacinth (Sunagash)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,150Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: In all Merlin’s long years of waiting, he never thought he’d re-meet Arthur in North America taming the Wild West. Let alone with everyone else from his past along for the ride.And he’s stuck as a horse.This is going be problematic isn’t it.Or Merlin in a Wild West AU because I can.
